public class Background
extends Object3DType

Java class for anonymous complex type.

The following schema fragment specifies the expected content contained within this class. 

 <complexType>
   <complexContent>
     <extension base="{}Object3DType">
       <sequence>
         <element ref="{}Image2DInstance" minOccurs="0"/>
       </sequence>
       <attribute name="color" type="{}int" default="0" />
       <attribute name="modeX" type="{}BackgroundRepeatType" />
       <attribute name="modeY" type="{}BackgroundRepeatType" />
       <attribute name="cropX" type="{}int" />
       <attribute name="cropY" type="{}int" />
       <attribute name="cropWidth" type="{}int" />
       <attribute name="cropHeight" type="{}int" />
       <attribute name="depthClear" type="{}bool" />
       <attribute name="colorClear" type="{}bool" />
     </extension>
   </complexContent>
 </complexType>
